featured.title: The Road to Intelligent Cities
featured.notes: A comprehensive overview of the evolution, current state, and future prospects of intelligent cities, exploring the integration of technology, data analytics, and urban planning to enhance urban living.

featured.title: Achieving Sustainable Smart Cities through Geospatial Data-Driven Approaches
featured.notes: This publication discusses the role of geospatial data in developing sustainable smart cities, highlighting innovative approaches and technologies that leverage spatial information to improve urban sustainability and resilience.
